-1.title: Queda do Boeing na Amazônia
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Series in six episodes revealing the history of tragic incidents that occurred in Latin American countries, with an emphasis on Brazil. Each case is counted by two survivors, in reports enriched by dramatizations and testimony of people involved in the rescue. 6 episodes from 45 'to 50' each, totalizing 270 '/ 300'. Documentary.
